name: Suited Scarlett
description:
Scarlett is a knight who just lost her new suit of armor. Control her through 3 mini games in order to assemble a new armor set. Unlock new palettes by getting each ending on all 3 difficulty settings.

Controls:
Arrow Keys: Movement
Z: Confirm/Action
X: Cancel
Enter: Pause/Skip cut scenes

Known Issues:
- Gallery Button currently doesn't work
- Numbers pertaining to score don't show on the correct palette.

Godot Jam:
- Main Theme: Assembly Required
- Wildcards used: 4 color palette, thermometer, and plot twist (Only if you get A rank)
